籤詩版本二:
He tiger ʻo Lin Wei e kiaʻi ana i ka puka.
Ua ʻōlelo maopopo ʻia ʻaʻohe mea e mālama ai, aia ka hopohopo, ka hopohopo, ka makaʻu a me ka makaʻu i ka nahele → lāʻau.
詩意:
Ma kēia hexagram, he kiʻi ikaika nā lāʻau nahele a me nā tigers.
ʻAʻole ʻoiaʻiʻo maoli nā puʻupuʻu hoʻopunipuni a pau.
解曰: Hoʻomālamalama ke kapuahi i ka hau. Me he mea lā ua hāʻule ka makani i nā pepeiao kuli. Hiki ke lilo i mea hoʻomaikaʻi. Hiki mai nā mea maikaʻi a hiki mai nā mea ʻino ma mua o lākou.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Makaʻu ʻo Pang Hong iā Bao Gong
Renzong o ka moʻokūʻauhau mele. ʻO Bao Gong ke kiaʻāina o Kaifeng Prefecture (inoa kūhelu, e like me ka prefect). ʻO Pang Hong ka makuahōnōwai kāne (ke hūnōna kāne a ka mōʻī) a hoʻopaʻahao ʻo General Di Qing. I ka manawa i noi ai ʻo Bao Gong e hoʻokolokolo i ka hihia, ua makaʻu ʻo Pang Hong a ua pāpā ʻia ma nā ʻano he nui. Ma hope mai, ua ʻike ʻia ka hihia a ua hōʻoia ʻia ka hoʻopiʻi wahaheʻe a Pang Hong. Ua waiho ʻia ʻo ia i ke kauoha imperial a Emperor Renzong o ka Song Dynasty a ua hoʻokuʻu ʻia ʻo ia no kona ʻohana.
聖意: ʻAʻole ʻoluʻolu ma ka home, ʻōlelo ponoʻī, noi kālā, ʻoihana ʻino, male maikaʻi ʻole, Liujia ʻinikua wahaheʻe, keakea hele wāwae, ʻino silika, ʻeono holoholona pōʻino, nalowale kanaka, hoʻopiʻi lehulehu, poho, neʻe, conservativeness, nalowale waiwai, maʻi, mōhai. , Husana lua, ino
古人: Makaʻu ʻo Pang Hong iā Bao Gong
